lead_paragraph: Sampdoria have signed Argentine attacking midfielder Ricky Alvarez on a free transfer from Inter Milan until the end of the season, the Italian club said in a statement on their website (www.sampdoria.it).

headline.print_headline: Sampdoria Sign Argentine Alvarez on Free Transfer
headline.main: Sampdoria Sign Argentine Alvarez on Free Transfer
